      • changeCharacter

        public abstract void changeCharacter(int charOption,
                                     org.eclipse.swt.graphics.RGB nColor,
                                     java.lang.String path)
        Function for changing the character design.
        Parameters:
        charOption - type of the wanter char: 1-Ball,1001-Picture,1002-Animation.
        nColor - Color if a ball Character selected.
        Path - for setting a picture/animation character.

        Parameters:
        m - The Game we want to display.
        resetChar - Used for resetting the character when setting a new one(true=reset).
